attributes.action: Improve the standard of driving by "Grading Drivers"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that whatever we do in our chosen vocation, nearly every person trains to improve their skills/position.
So, please introduce a "Driver Grading" exam, and allow Driving standards to improve by taking annual courses thus allowing better drivers to have more privileges !
